title: Locomotion Pack Pro
description: Motion Capture movement Animations for Male Character
longDescription:
Digital Kinetics brings you,


Locomotion Pack Pro - Version 5 Update!


This updated package features 208 Mocap animations for male general movement and a male game character model, making it ideal for creating smooth, third-person character movement in your game. The animations are versatile and can be used in any genre.


The pack includes walking, running, crouching, appropriate idles, jumps, and climbing transitions.


Mo-Capped body and fingers with the latest optical mocap technology.


Retargeted for Unreal Engine and 5.0-5.4 Manny


Patch Notes:

  • Fixed IK bone issues
  • Fixed Spine Bend
  • Finger polish
  • Added Start Animations for Walk/Run
  • Added IK bones support
  • Run Animation polished
  • Fixed minor jitters
  • Improved anckles and feet
  • Minor adjustments


Let us know your suggestions for future updates!


Demo Video

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Walking
  •  Running
  •  Crouching
  • Idle
  • Jumping
  • Rotating
  • Strafing
  • Start-Stop
  • Poses
  • Direction Changes



Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes

Number of Animations: 208

Animation types: Root Motion and In-place

Number of Characters: 1


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Transform your ideas into captivating customized animations for your project!


Our team of experienced animators ensures high-quality, tailor-made animations using the latest Vicon Valkyrie cameras.

Contact us at info@digital-kinetics.com and bring your vision to life!


Visit our work at www.digital-kinetics.com
